fields.name: D_CAL
fields.description: Resistor Trimming Code: 0000 = 0.16% 0111 = Nominal 1111 = +25%

fields.name: RSVD0
fields.description: Reserved. Note: This bit should remain clear.

fields.name: TXCAL45DN
fields.description: Decode to select a 45-Ohm resistance to the USB_DN output pin

fields.name: RSVD1
fields.description: Reserved. Note: This bit should remain clear.

fields.name: TXCAL45DP
fields.description: Decode to select a 45-Ohm resistance to the USB_DP output pin

fields.name: RSVD2
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: USBPHY_TX_EDGECTRL
fields.description: Controls the edge-rate of the current sensing transistors used in HS transmit

fields.name: RSVD5
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: ENVADJ
fields.description: The ENVADJ field adjusts the trip point for the envelope detector

fields.name: RSVD0
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: DISCONADJ
fields.description: The DISCONADJ field adjusts the trip point for the disconnect detector: 000 = Trip-Level Voltage is 0

fields.name: RSVD1
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: RXDBYPASS
fields.description: 0 = Normal operation

fields.name: RSVD2
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: ENVADJ
fields.description: The ENVADJ field adjusts the trip point for the envelope detector

fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: DISCONADJ
fields.description: The DISCONADJ field adjusts the trip point for the disconnect detector: 000 = Trip-Level Voltage is 0

fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: RXDBYPASS
fields.description: 0 = Normal operation

fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: RXDBYPASS
fields.description: 0 = Normal operation

fields.name: RSVD2
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: ENOTG_ID_CHG_IRQ
fields.description: Enable OTG_ID_CHG_IRQ.

fields.name: ENHOSTDISCONDETECT
fields.description: For host mode, enables high-speed disconnect detector

fields.name: ENIRQHOSTDISCON
fields.description: Enables interrupt for detection of disconnection to Device when in high-speed host mode

fields.name: HOSTDISCONDETECT_IRQ
fields.description: Indicates that the device has disconnected in high-speed mode

fields.name: ENDEVPLUGINDETECT
fields.description: For device mode, enables 200-KOhm pullups for detecting connectivity to the host.

fields.name: DEVPLUGIN_POLARITY
fields.description: For device mode, if this bit is cleared to 0, then it trips the interrupt if the device is plugged in

fields.name: OTG_ID_CHG_IRQ
fields.description: OTG ID change interrupt. Indicates the value of ID pin changed.

fields.name: ENOTGIDDETECT
fields.description: Enables circuit to detect resistance of MiniAB ID pin.

fields.name: RESUMEIRQSTICKY
fields.description: Set to 1 will make RESUME_IRQ bit a sticky bit until software clear it

fields.name: ENIRQRESUMEDETECT
fields.description: Enables interrupt for detection of a non-J state on the USB line

fields.name: RESUME_IRQ
fields.description: Indicates that the host is sending a wake-up after suspend

fields.name: ENIRQDEVPLUGIN
fields.description: Enables interrupt for the detection of connectivity to the USB line.

fields.name: DEVPLUGIN_IRQ
fields.description: Indicates that the device is connected

fields.name: DATA_ON_LRADC
fields.description: Enables the LRADC to monitor USB_DP and USB_DM. This is for use in non-USB modes only.

fields.name: ENUTMILEVEL2
fields.description: Enables UTMI+ Level2. This should be enabled if needs to support LS device

fields.name: ENUTMILEVEL3
fields.description: Enables UTMI+ Level3

fields.name: ENIRQWAKEUP
fields.description: Enables interrupt for the wakeup events.

fields.name: WAKEUP_IRQ
fields.description: Indicates that there is a wakeup event

fields.name: ENAUTO_PWRON_PLL
fields.description: Enables the feature to auto-enable the POWER bit of HW_CLKCTRL_PLLxCTRL0 if there is wakeup event if USB is suspended

fields.name: ENAUTOCLR_CLKGATE
fields.description: Enables the feature to auto-clear the CLKGATE bit if there is wakeup event while USB is suspended

fields.name: ENAUTOCLR_PHY_PWD
fields.description: Enables the feature to auto-clear the PWD register bits in USBPHYx_PWD if there is wakeup event while USB is suspended

fields.name: ENDPDMCHG_WKUP
fields.description: Enables the feature to wakeup USB if DP/DM is toggled when USB is suspended

fields.name: ENIDCHG_WKUP
fields.description: Enables the feature to wakeup USB if ID is toggled when USB is suspended.

fields.name: ENVBUSCHG_WKUP
fields.description: Enables the feature to wakeup USB if VBUS is toggled when USB is suspended.

fields.name: FSDLL_RST_EN
fields.description: Enables the feature to reset the FSDLL lock detection logic at the end of each TX packet.

fields.name: RSVD1
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: OTG_ID_VALUE
fields.description: Almost same as OTGID_STATUS in USBPHYx_STATUS Register

fields.name: HOST_FORCE_LS_SE0
fields.description: Forces the next FS packet that is transmitted to have a EOP with LS timing

fields.name: UTMI_SUSPENDM
fields.description: Used by the PHY to indicate a powered-down state

fields.name: CLKGATE
fields.description: Gate UTMI Clocks

fields.name: SFTRST
fields.description: Writing a 1 to this bit will soft-reset the USBPHYx_PWD, USBPHYx_TX, USBPHYx_RX, and USBPHYx_CTRL registers

fields.description: Enable OTG_ID_CHG_IRQ.

fields.name: RSVD0
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: HOSTDISCONDETECT_STATUS
fields.description: Indicates that the device has disconnected while in high-speed host mode.

fields.name: RSVD1
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: DEVPLUGIN_STATUS
fields.description: Indicates that the device has been connected on the USB_DP and USB_DM lines.

fields.name: RSVD2
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: OTGID_STATUS
fields.description: Indicates the results of ID pin on MiniAB plug

fields.name: RSVD3
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: RESUME_STATUS
fields.description: Indicates that the host is sending a wake-up after suspend and has triggered an interrupt.

fields.name: RSVD4
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: OTGIDPIOLOCK
fields.description: Once OTG ID from USBPHYx_STATUS_OTGID_STATUS, use this to hold the value

fields.name: DEBUG_INTERFACE_HOLD
fields.description: Use holding registers to assist in timing for external UTMI interface.

fields.name: HSTPULLDOWN
fields.description: Set bit 3 to 1 to pull down 15-KOhm on USB_DP line

fields.name: ENHSTPULLDOWN
fields.description: Set bit 5 to 1 to override the control of the USB_DP 15-KOhm pulldown

fields.name: RSVD0
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: TX2RXCOUNT
fields.description: Delay in between the end of transmit to the beginning of receive

fields.name: ENTX2RXCOUNT
fields.description: Set this bit to allow a countdown to transition in between TX and RX.

fields.name: RSVD1
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: SQUELCHRESETCOUNT
fields.description: Delay in between the detection of squelch to the reset of high-speed RX.

fields.name: RSVD2
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: ENSQUELCHRESET
fields.description: Set bit to allow squelch to reset high-speed receive.

fields.name: SQUELCHRESETLENGTH
fields.description: Duration of RESET in terms of the number of 480-MHz cycles.

fields.name: HOST_RESUME_DEBUG
fields.description: Choose to trigger the host resume SE0 with HOST_FORCE_LS_SE0 = 0 or UTMI_SUSPEND = 1.

fields.name: CLKGATE
fields.description: Gate Test Clocks

fields.name: RSVD3
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: OTGIDPIOLOCK
fields.description: Once OTG ID from USBPHYx_STATUS_OTGID_STATUS, use this to hold the value

fields.description: Use holding registers to assist in timing for external UTMI interface.

fields.description: Set bit 3 to 1 to pull down 15-KOhm on USB_DP line

fields.name: ENHSTPULLDOWN
fields.description: Set bit 5 to 1 to override the control of the USB_DP 15-KOhm pulldown

fields.name: RSVD3
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: OTGIDPIOLOCK
fields.description: Once OTG ID from USBPHYx_STATUS_OTGID_STATUS, use this to hold the value

fields.name: DEBUG_INTERFACE_HOLD
fields.description: Use holding registers to assist in timing for external UTMI interface.

fields.name: HSTPULLDOWN
fields.description: Set bit 3 to 1 to pull down 15-KOhm on USB_DP line

fields.name: ENHSTPULLDOWN
fields.description: Set bit 5 to 1 to override the control of the USB_DP 15-KOhm pulldown

fields.name: RSVD0
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: TX2RXCOUNT
fields.description: Delay in between the end of transmit to the beginning of receive

fields.name: ENTX2RXCOUNT
fields.description: Set this bit to allow a countdown to transition in between TX and RX.

fields.name: RSVD1
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: SQUELCHRESETCOUNT
fields.description: Delay in between the detection of squelch to the reset of high-speed RX.

fields.name: RSVD2
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: ENSQUELCHRESET
fields.description: Set bit to allow squelch to reset high-speed receive.

fields.name: SQUELCHRESETLENGTH
fields.description: Duration of RESET in terms of the number of 480-MHz cycles.

fields.name: HOST_RESUME_DEBUG
fields.description: Choose to trigger the host resume SE0 with HOST_FORCE_LS_SE0 = 0 or UTMI_SUSPEND = 1.

fields.name: CLKGATE
fields.description: Gate Test Clocks

fields.name: RSVD3
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: LOOP_BACK_FAIL_COUNT
fields.description: Running count of the failed pseudo-random generator loopback

fields.name: UTMI_RXERROR_FAIL_COUNT
fields.description: Running count of the UTMI_RXERROR.

fields.name: SQUELCH_COUNT
fields.description: Running count of the squelch reset instead of normal end for HS RX.

fields.name: RSVD0
fields.description: Reserved. Note: This bit should remain clear.

fields.name: ENTAILADJVD
fields.description: Delay increment of the rise of squelch: 00 = Delay is nominal 01 = Delay is +20% 10 = Delay is -20% 11 = Delay is -40%

fields.name: RSVD1
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: RSVD0
fields.description: Reserved. Note: This bit should remain clear.

fields.name: ENTAILADJVD
fields.description: Delay increment of the rise of squelch: 00 = Delay is nominal 01 = Delay is +20% 10 = Delay is -20% 11 = Delay is -40%

fields.name: RSVD1
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: RSVD0
fields.description: Reserved. Note: This bit should remain clear.

fields.name: ENTAILADJVD
fields.description: Delay increment of the rise of squelch: 00 = Delay is nominal 01 = Delay is +20% 10 = Delay is -20% 11 = Delay is -40%

fields.name: RSVD1
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: RSVD0
fields.description: Reserved. Note: This bit should remain clear.

fields.name: ENTAILADJVD
fields.description: Delay increment of the rise of squelch: 00 = Delay is nominal 01 = Delay is +20% 10 = Delay is -20% 11 = Delay is -40%

fields.name: RSVD1
fields.description: Reserved.

fields.name: STEP
fields.description: Fixed read-only value reflecting the stepping of the RTL version.

fields.name: MINOR
fields.description: Fixed read-only value reflecting the MINOR field of the RTL version.

fields.name: MAJOR
fields.description: Fixed read-only value reflecting the MAJOR field of the RTL version.
